siteMetadata.title: Blep Technologies - Building the Future of Web 3.0

hero.subheader: Blep Technologies is one of the fastest growing, leading blockchain data infrastructure players, making alternative data easily accessible by everyone.

pageContent.about: We focus on real-time blockchain and blockchain-adjacent data, and offer a library of over 200,000 real time streams of raw metrics while connecting to thousands of blockchain applications on Ethereum today.
pageContent.productsHeading: Empowering developers, and people worldwide to build on Ethereum and multi-chain for Web 3.0.

products.title: Nakji Network
products.desc: NAKJI connects traditional web infrastructure to blockchains seamlessly for data consumers and data producers.

products.title: BitScope
products.desc: Chart blockchain data including markets, liquidity pools, and stats on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and more.

pageContent.blogHeading: Blockchain infrastructure for the decentralised web.
